meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Neil Plakcy Barbara Herington Judith Seeger Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #715.

td.p: Neil Plakcy, a writer originally from Yardley, Pennsylvania
Barbara Herington, a civil engineer from Cromwell, Connecticut
Judith Seeger, an associate research engineer from Mountain View, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,500)

tr.td: BEETHOVEN
ADVERTISING
SYMPTOMS
SPORTS
HISTORICAL HORSES
"FOR" WORDS

Judith
')

[All 3 players smiling.]

Sergeant Preston

JudithNeil
')
